lines.text:
[From her train berth]
Eddie! Oh, Eddie!
Will you get Mother a drink of water, please?
Aw, Florence, I wanted some sleep at night!
But, dear, mother won't go to sleep if you don't get a drink of water.
Aw, I don't want to get any water now!

[Sticking his head through his upper berth curtain, supremely annoyed]
Baldy, get her a drink of of water, and we'll all get to sleep!
